CSV/JSON", "3 Select the fields to be exported"? 14:22 <sdumitriu> I'd say yes 14:22 <sdumitriu> Marta didn't agree, but we'll see how it turns out 14:23 <akats> Ok. 14:23 <akats> Did she propose adding a second "Export" button? 14:24 <sdumitriu> Yes 14:30 <akats> There is merit in that idea. From the UX perspective, it might actually be better. You don't want to throw words like "JSON" onto an unsuspecting user.
